Excellent running! Hard length around off, Jadeja hops back and just dabs it down wide of the keeper in front of the gully region and picks up an easy single.
Short and really dug in around off, gently seaming away, Jadeja pulls out of the shot and lets it through to the keeper.
Back of a length and at the batter, worked away neatly from the crease and in front of mid-wicket. Jadeja picks up a couple of runs in the deep.
Tongue goes even shorter and bangs it in over middle, angling in, Jadeja ducks under it again but the ball really sails over. A wide called for height.
A quick bumper now! Tongue bends his back and bowls it shorter over middle and off and gets it at an awkward height. Jadeja manages to duck under it.
On a hard length and angled down the leg side, Jadeja leaves it alone.

FOUR! That is picture-perfect from Ravindra Jadeja. Pitched up on middle, Jadeja prods halfway forward and just shows the full face of the blade, bunting it down the ground. The ball goes off the middle of the bat and to the right of mid on and rolls away into the fence.
Flighted up around middle, nudged across to wide mid on.
Tossed up, quite full and around off, Shubman Gill gets forward and inside the line, driving it firmly to the right of the bowler who does well to stop it with a dive.
Nagging length on off, Jadeja just presses back and taps the ball to the right of covers before scampering through for a quick single.

Floated up, not all that full but lands it down leg. Jadeja moves past the leg stump and shoulders arms, getting hit on the pads as the ball rolls on the pitch. Jadeja then smothers the ball to prevent it from rolling anywhere near the stumps, before Jamie Smith walks forward and picks the ball up.
Bowled into the pitch and angled in towards the pads, Jadeja stays back and turns it away to backward square leg.
Holds it back a bit and flights it on a length around off, Jadeja waits back and keeps it out into the off side.
The call is for two initially but they won't get it. Full and straight, almost in the blockhole, Jadeja shovels it away towards deep mid-wicket and picks up a single to end the over.
Hard length wide of the off stump, chopped down to wide deep third for a single by Gill.
On a good length, pitching it around the fifth stump line and gets it to angle in. Gill defends down the line.
Very full and outside off, there to be hit but Shubman Gill pings the cover drive straight to the cover fielder.
Keeps the length full but the line it a bit too straight. Jadeja stays forward and clips it away in front of square leg for a single.
Spears in a yorker on off stump from around the stumps. Jadeja digs it out to mid on and looks for the single but decides against it.
Flighted ball on off, Gill gets right back into his disciplined mindset and blocks it off.

FOUR! Well, well, a very, very rare shot from Shubman Gill. Fuller in length and at the stumps, Gill brings out the reverse sweep and gets it well behind square on the off side for a boundary. When was the last time we saw Gill do that?
Fuller in length and around leg as well, flicked away just wide of square leg.
Stays around the wicket to the right-hander as well and floats it up on the pads. Gill tucks it towards square leg.
More flighted this time and on the legs, nudged away in front of square leg for an easy single.
Tossed up a bit quicker and at the toes, Jadeja pushes it to silly mid on.
Around the wicket now and angles in a shortish ball towards the hips. Jadeja just turns it through square leg for one.
Short of a length and just angled across off, this one doesn't rise up quite as much as Jadeja leans back and lets it through.
A gentle short ball angling down leg, Gill gets inside the line and helps the pull down to fine leg for a single.
Gill pre-meditates by backing away and tries to open up the off side. Carse follows him with a short ball and Gill manages to tap it down to backward point.

The call is for two and they get it with ease. Back of a length and outside off, Gill punches it with a straight bat and through the vacant mid off region. The fielder from extra cover gives chase as the batters pick up two runs.
Banged in short and over leg, Jadeja plays a controlled pull shot and gets it behind square leg for a single.
Slows it up and flights it outside off, Gill gets a good stride forward and solidly blocks it off.
Comes around the wicket now and serves it full around off, Gill pushes it away to short cover.
Nicely flighted, on a nagging length and around off, Gill lunges to defend.
Darted in a bit, full and on middle, nudged across to short mid-wicket.
Flighted ball, angling down leg, Jadeja misses the clip and the ball tickles off the pads to short fine leg. They pick up a quick leg bye.

There it is, a maiden score of 150 in Test cricket for Shubman Gill and what a start he has had to his captaincy career in terms of his batting. Lobbed up on off, Gill leans on and eases it down to long on for a single and gets a huge round of applause from the crowd.
Some lateral movement, short and angling across. Ravindra Jadeja drops the wrists to leave and the ball shapes away late as Jamie Smith collects it to his left.
Short again, on middle, pulled away to deep backward square leg for a single.

FOUR! Effortless! Good-length delivery, outside off, Shubman Gill gets on the toes and punches it wide of backward point for a boundary. This is now Gill's highest individual score in Test cricket. He has surpassed his previous best of 147, which he scored in this series itself, in the first Test at Headingley. Also, unbeaten at 149 now, Gill is 30 runs behind to surpass former Indian captain, Mohammed Azharuddin, to register the best Test score by any Indian captain on English soil. Azharuddin scored 179 in 1990, at Manchester. So Gill is in touching distance to break that record as well.
The field is spread out now and Carse again shoots a short ball, on leg, Ravindra Jadeja controls the pull shot to the fielder at deepish backward square leg for a single.
Short and angled across, on off, Ravindra Jadeja arches back and drops his wrists to leave.
FOUR! Pulled away neatly! Carse with a short ball, on off, Ravindra Jadeja has all the time in the world to swivel and pull it to deep backward square leg for a boundary.
Lands it around off and turns it in, on off, Gill watchfully defends it out. Also, this is the first maiden on Day 2.
Pulls the length back, at off, Shubman Gill strides to the pitch of the ball, to defend, but the ball spins in a touch and takes the inside edge and drops on the pitch.
Flat and quick, full and on middle, Shubman Gill pushes it back to Bashir.
Outside off, but with some grip and turn into the batter, Shubman Gill taps his front foot out but leaves it.
Full, and on off, Gill again defends it straight.
Very slow through the air, outside off, Shubman Gill strides ahead and blocks.
Sharp bouncer on top of the stumps. Ravindra Jadeja dodges this bullet and ducks under it.
Goes short again, outside off, Shubman Gill dabs it along the ground and guides it to widish deep third. The deep backward point fielder mops it up to his left and the batters settle in for a single.

Cannoned fuller and outside off, Shubman Gill cracks the cover drive, but Ollie Pope does well to stop it with a dive to his right. In all fairness, it was travelling at the rate of knots. So well-fielded by Pope there.
A bumper at the shoulder height of the batter. Jadeja swivels and pulls it to deep square leg for a single.
Dug in short and outside off, Ravindra Jadeja gets on the toes, and drops it on the pitch with soft hands.
Shortish delivery, on the stumps, Shubman Gill pulls it to deep backward square leg for a single.
Tossed up on off, Shubman Gill flicks this full ball to long on for a single.
The 150-run stand comes up between Jadeja and Gill. Full and floated on middle and leg, steered along the turf to deep square leg for a single.

Oh, this goes straight with the arm, around off. Jadeja positions himself to flick it across, but misses and is trapped in front as the ball hits him on his thigh pad. A bit too high for anyone to appeal, and Jadeja shows out his frustration with a loud grunt.

That could have gone anywhere! Jadeja shows his cards early as he steps down the track. Bashir smartly pulls the length back and keeps it on middle. Ravindra Jadeja is forward, but not up to the pitch of the ball and goes for a wild heave across the line. Gets it off the inner half of the bat and hits it to mid-wicket.
Flighted on middle, Ravindra Jadeja takes it on the full and clips it to short mid-wicket.
Dropped too full, on off, flicked down to widish long on by Gill. Another single.

Hard length, and the line is on middle and leg, with the ball cutting back in a touch. Shubman Gill gets across to work it into the leg side, but misses and the ball lobs off the front pad and drops in front of the point region. A leg bye taken.

FOUR! More runs! This is right out of the coach's manual! Full and outside off now from Carse, Shubman Gill takes a good stride forward and places this magnificently to deep point for a boundary. Duckett gives it a chase from deep third, to his right, but the ball has enough wheels to race into the fence.

FOUR! Through the gap! Carse pushes this further up and bowls a bit too full, around off, Shubman Gill takes a short stride ahead, meets the ball under the eyes and flicks this along the ground, and through the right of mid on for a boundary.
Slants it in on off and middle, Shubman Gill drills the full ball to mid on.
Goes full again, at off, Shubman Gill knocks it to the cover region.

BEATEN! Good one from Carse! In the corridor of uncertainty, compelling the batter to play at it. Shubman Gill draws his front foot out to defend this full ball, but it lands and straightens up a bit, and beats the outside edge.
Slides it onto the pads, Jadeja tickles it straight to short fine leg.
More flight given, full, straight and outside off, Shubman Gill waits and flicks it through mid on for a single. And with that, the 350 comes up for India!
Pitches fuller and tosses around off, Shubman Gill eases it back to the bowler.
Touch full and on off, Shubman Gill goes back in the crease and knocks it on the pitch.
Drags the length, on off, Shubman Gill nudges it to the leg side.
Around off and full, pushed gently to the right of Bashir.
A short-pitched delivery, right on the radar, on top of off. Ravindra Jadeja leans back and lets it through to the keeper.
Full again, just outside off, Ravindra Jadeja takes a giant stride out to block, but gets an inside edge and the ball rolls on the pitch off his front pad.
Full and around off, Jadeja presses in front and defends it watchfully.

Bangs it hard on the pitch, does Carse, on off, Ravindra Jadeja climbs over it and dabs it in the off side. Looks to pinch in a quick single but there's none and Gill sends him with a sharp 'No' call.
Bowls from a wider angle, slants in from off, on a fullish length. Ravindra Jadeja solidly blocks it off.
Starts from over the stumps, lands it on a length, on middle. Shubman Gill tucks it across into the mid-wicket region for a single.
A tempter from Woakes! Just outside off and curving in from the angle, Ravindra Jadeja shapes himself to play at it, but bails out of the shot at the last moment and leaves.
Keeps the line of attack on the stumps, tad around off. Ravindra Jadeja plays the ball late and stabs it out to the off side, just beside the pitch.
Around the stumps, length ball, angling on middle. Ravindra Jadeja gets right behind it and blocks it out onto the pitch.
Quick tap and run! Hard length, on off, Shubman Gill hops off and taps it to backward point for a single.

FOUR! That's gloriously driven! Woakes pitches it really full, and around off, it is a scrambled-seam delivery which goes straight on. Shubman Gill keeps a steady head, taps his front foot out and caresses this through cover for a boundary.
Straight and full, on middle, Gill covers the line and pushes it to mid on.
Another one outside off and on a good length, Jadeja presses ahead but decides to let it be.
Length, fairly outside off, Jadeja does not poke at that and leaves.
Varies the length again. Stokes bowls a short ball, around off, Ravindra Jadeja arches back a bit to leave.
Attacks the stumps and goes fuller, does Stokes, Jadeja respects it and defends it back.

FOUR! Two in two for Jadeja! Back of a length and outside off, Ravindra Jadeja has enough time and width to weigh on the back foot and he cuts it to the left of the backward point fielder for a boundary.
FOUR! Punched away neatly! A bit shortish on off, Ravindra Jadeja climbs on the ball, brings his bat in front of the body and punches it through cover for a boundary. A cracking shot that.
Same line, same length, Gill again blocks.
Full and on off, Gill leans ahead and defends.

Overthrows! Back of a length, angling in from off. Ravindra Jadeja hops off and drops it in the mid-wicket region and sets off for a single. With no fielder there, Woakes himself gets to the ball by running across the strip to his left. Picks up and releases a flat throw at the bowling end, but misses to strike a direct hit. The ball goes towards mid off and wide of the backup fielder, Stokes, and rolls behind him. However, he is quick to recover and chases it, but the batters hurry back for the third.
Shapes into the batter, full in length, Ravindra Jadeja blocks it out.
Goes down leg, on a length, Ravindra Jadeja gets inside the line and leaves.
Quick run. Full delivery outside off. Gill leans forward and taps to covers, and takes off for a quick single.
Shorter of a good length and slightly wide outside off, Jadeja just tucks his hands behind his body and leaves it alone.
A tad fuller in length and in the channel around off. Jadeja makes a watchful leave as the ball carries nicely through to the keeper.
Back of a length and tighter around off stump, Jadeja hops and awkwardly fends the ball down towards the gully region.
Shorter this time and outside off, dabbed away from the crease and just behind backward point for a single by Gill.
On a hard length and outside off, Gill stays upright and taps the ball down towards cover.

On a fuller length and outside off, Gill blocks it towards cover. Also, in between overs, there was some more frustration from the English players with Jadeja wandering into the danger area and Woakes, in particular, seemed unhappy.
On a good length and around off, eased away into the off side by Jadeja.
Short of a good length and on middle and leg, tucked away in front of square leg and into the deep for a run.
Full and outside off, Gill creams the cover drive but finds the fielder at extra cover.

Flicked away off the legs and that will be FIFTY for Ravindra Jadeja, his 23rd in Test matches and it has come at a crucial time for his side. Hard length around the pads, Jadeja flicks it towards deep square leg and picks up the single and even brings out that signature celebration, wielding his willow like a sword.
Good length, in and around off, blocked back towards the bowler.

Oh, that shot off the deck! On a hard length and outside off, Shubman Gill sets up for the cut but is taken aback by the extra bounce. Gill manages to control it decently and gets it through backward point for a single.
Back of a length and around off, guided away from the crease and down towards deep third for a single.

No ball! Fuller in length and wide outside off, gets it to nibble away and Gill just shoulders arms at it. Stokes has now overstepped on the last ball of his over, just like Woakes did in the previous over.
Length ball on off and middle, blocked back into the deck.
Good-length delivery, darted in towards middle and leg. Jadeja is late to play at it and just about jams it out through the square leg region for yet another single.
Back of a length and angled outside off, Gill reaches out and taps it away from the body, through backward point for another run.
Short of a length and over middle, angling in, Jadeja tucks it away off the body and through square leg for a single.
Pitched up on the sixth stump line and leaving the batter pretty late, Jadeja gets a stride in and leaves it alone.
The three-quarter length and around off, Gill stays well forward and defends it out.

NO BALL AND FOUR! Good length in the channel, just seaming away a touch. Shubman Gill pushes at it with soft hands and gets an outside edge that goes down and in between second slip and gully for a streaky boundary. Also, Woakes has overstepped.
Good length again and around off, Gill is standing well out of his crease and pushes it away towards covers.
On a good length on off, angling in, Gill pushes it down towards mid on.
Hard-length delivery and around off, tapped away through the cover-point region for a single by Jadeja.
Good length around off, Jadeja jams it down onto the deck.
FOUR! Easy pickings! Loose from Woakes, serves a half volley on the pads and Ravindra Jadeja clips it away elegantly and through the gap at mid-wicket for a boundary.
Drop and run! Back of a length and around off, Jadeja plays it off the back foot and just nudges it down behind point for a quick single.
Nagging length, in the channel outside off and going straight on. Jadeja strides across and makes a leave.
Goes full and straight now, Jadeja shows the full face of the blade and pushes it just back past the bowler.

Digs this one in short and over off, Jadeja hops back up on his toes and defends it just past the pitch on the off side. The umpire has a word with Stokes as he is flirting with the danger area on the follow-through.
Around the wicket to the left-hander, bowled on a fuller length and well outside off. Ravindra Jadeja lets it through to the keeper.

First run of the day and it comes from the bat of the Indian skipper. Short ball angled into middle at a gentle pace, Gill stays compact and nudges it down to mid-wicket for a single. The 100-run stand is also up between these two.

The partnership moves to 99 runs and Gill and Jadeja see India through the final session! Bowls it straight and full on middle, does Woakes, Shubman Gill walks a few steps forward to push it straight back, but gets a thick inside edge and the ball goes to the square leg region for a single. And that will be STUMPS ON DAY 1!
Aims the stumps, full and on middle. Shubman Gill tilts forward to defend, but gets a thick outside edge and the ball rolls to the cover region.
Good-length delivery, angling on middle, Ravindra Jadeja steers this to the square leg region and gets a quick single.
Nagging length, on off, Ravindra Jadeja blocks it off the back foot.

Fired in fuller and around off, Ravindra Jadeja looks to flick it away, but inside edges onto the front pad and the ball rolls to the point region. Jadeja is keen to get a single, but is sent back by Gill on a very sharp call. Jadeja obeys, turns around and gets back home.
Back of a length, on off, Ravindra Jadeja gets on the back foot and nudges this to the leg side.
Comes from around the stumps, does Carse, on middle and on a length. Ravindra Jadeja is on the toes and taps it in the mid-wicket region for a quick single.
Banged halfway onto the pitch, on middle and leg, Shubman Gill gets across a bit and tucks this to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Speared in full and just outside off, Shubman Gill prods forward and decides to offer no shot at it.
Identical line and length and Gill works this to mid on.
Length, on middle. Punched to mid on.

Good bit of work in the deep by Pope! Back of a length, outside off, Shubman Gill cuts it in front of square off the back foot. The ball travels to the deep cover fence and Ollie Pope from deep backward point sprints to his right. Gets to the ball with a slide, but it slips out as he slides on. It then trickles towards the fence, but Pope shows good awareness and picks up right before it touches the cushions. Two taken.
On a length, from around the wicket and darted down the leg side. Jadeja misses the flick.
On a good length and around off, Jadeja lunges to defend.
On the fuller side and outside off, pushed away towards cover for one. Jadeja is a bit slow to react but the batters make it through without a fuss.
Hard length over the top of off, Gill defends down the line.
Hits a good length and bowls it outside off again, gets some extra lift off the deck as Gill shoulders arms at it.
Pitches the ball up on the fifth stump line, gets it to nip away as well. Gill makes a watchful leave.
Hard length around middle, dabbed away wide of the mid on fielder for a quick but easy single.
On a good length and outside off, nibbling away, left alone by Gill.

FOUR! Dishes out a full and wide one, swinging away. Shubman Gill stays put and goes after it. The ball flies off the outside edge and goes over gully for a boundary. The 300 comes up for India as well.
Good length and seaming away quite a bit, too wide though from Carse and Gill leaves it alone.
Pitched up around leg stump, Shubman Gill gets his hands out in front and chips it away into the gap at mid-wicket and picks up a couple of runs in the deep.
Fuller in length and outside off, nipping away a touch. Gill leaves it alone.

FOUR! Not far away from going straight to hand! Just back of a length and around off, this one straightens and bounces extra. Ravindra Jadeja is taken aback almost by the lack of pace and hangs his bat out there. The ball takes the outside edge and goes between second slip and gully for a boundary.
Around the wicket now to the left-hander, bowled on a length and in the channel outside off. Jadeja leaves it alone.
Good-length delivery on off, Jadeja watchfully keeps it out.
On the fuller side and around off, Ravindra Jadeja leans on and pats it to the right of cover and strolls out for a single. Shubman Gill sends him back and quickly too.
Pitched up around off, going straight on, Jadeja lunges and shows the full face of the bat to defend.
No ball! Short of a good length and around the body, tucked away into the leg side. Uh, oh! Woakes has overstepped and the umpire signals a No Ball.
Back of a length and from over the wicket. Bowled around of, Jadeja presses back and punches it down to covers.

FOUR! HUNDRED FOR SHUBMAN GILL! A very responsible innings from the Indian captain! His 7th Test century and 4th against England! A quicker delivery from Root, onto the pads, Shubman Gill crouches low and sweeps it to the long leg fence for a boundary. Gets off his helmet, does Gill, shows some aggression, removes his helmet, and gets his bat aloft. Follows it up with his signature bow-down gesture to acknowledge the applause from the Indian dressing room and the Edgbaston crowd. With this, Gill has two centuries in this series in two matches. He has played a steady hand, has taken his time and maturely held onto one end.
FOUR! Helped away! Root sticks to bowling outside leg, on a fuller length. Shubman Gill half-sweeps it to deep fine leg for a boundary at deep fine leg. Moves on to 98, does the Indian skipper.
Darted on the fuller length, around the leg stump. Shubman Gill gets forward and bumps it on the bounce to mid-wicket.
Outside leg once again, clipped to short mid-wicket.
Full again and Gill does the same. Flicks it to square leg.
Joe Root is into the attack now. Pitches it outside leg, Shubman Gill pushes this full ball to square leg.
Pushed through fuller and on off, Shubman Gill drills it down to long on for a single.
Full now, at off, Shubman Gill leans and flicks to short mid-wicket.
Bowls straighter and touch fuller, on off, Shubman Gill knocks it back to Bashir.
Looped right into the blockhole, on middle, Ravindra Jadeja carves it out and clips it to square leg for one.
Short and on off, Ravindra Jadeja hangs back and taps it out to short cover.
Slides on the leg stump, Shubman Gill flicks the full ball between deep square leg and deep mid-wicket for a single.
Length, outside off  Shubman Gill plays the chop-cut off the back foot and gets a single at deep backward point.
Touch full and around off, driven straight to mid off.

FOUR! The Indian skipper moves into the 90s with a brilliant shot! Around off, on a good length. Shubman Gill plays it late, and deliberately dabs it wide of the first slip fielder and collects the boundary at deep third.
Pitched around off and full, Gill presses forward and responds with a solid front foot block.
Short delivery, over the top of middle, Shubman Gill plays with soft hands and hits across to short mid-wicket.
Back of a length, angling on off, Shubman Gill gets behind it and tucks it to short mid-wicket.
Very slow through the air, full and on off, Ravindra Jadeja blocks it out with a huge stride out.
Slides on the leg stump on a length, steered into the leg side.

FOUR! Jadeja has looked much more comfortable against Bashir and hasn't allowed him to settle in the third session. Too full, and too wide of off, Ravindra Jadeja plants his front foot out and lofts it inside out over cover for a boundary.
Drags the length back, Ravindra Jadeja tucks this to short mid-wicket.
Darted full and on the leg stump line. Shubman Gill clips this to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Full on off, Shubman Gill flicks across to short mid-wicket.
Good length, on middle, Shubman Gill steers this to deep square leg for a single.

Well fielded in the deep! Short delivery, on the shoulder height of the batter. Shubman Gill pulls it to the vacant deep mid-wicket region and calls for two straightaway. Ben Duckett from deep square leg sprints to his left and slides through to stop the ball. It slips out on the first attempt as he goes on with the momentum, but the ball stays within his reach, and Duckett manages to keep it inside the ropes. However, the umpires check whether there's any part of his feet touching the ropes with the ball in hand. And after a couple of angles, the third umpire is convinced that Duckett has done a clean job to save two runs for his side.
Shortish delivery, outside off, Ravindra Jadeja gets on his toes and glides it away to the left of deep third for a single. Jadeja moves into the 30s now.
FOUR! Classic and well-timed! Almost a half-tracker from Tongue, outside off. Enough time for Jadeja to rock back and punch through the covers for a cracking boundary.
Nagging length, shoots off a bit, outside off, Jadeja stays back to leave.

Cannoned on the fuller length, on middle, Ravindra Jadeja plays with a straight bat and pushes it back to the bowler. It goes on the bump to the left of Josh Tongue who sticks his left hand out and parries the ball to the mid on region.
Quicker and pushed on the fuller length, on leg, Ravindra Jadeja flicks this along the turf to square leg for a single.
Fuller and on the stumps, a forward defence from Jadeja.
That inviting delivery from Bashir. Looped up, full and outside off. Ravindra Jadeja decides to not touch it.
Pulls the length back, does Bashir, Shubman Gill punches this off the back foot to widish long on for a single. The 50-run partnership comes up between these two.
Nice and full, around off, kept out on the off side.

Too full and on middle, Ravindra Jadeja shimmies down the track and smashes it to the left of the bowler. Shoaib Bashir dives on the follow-through to his left, gets his left hand on the ball and parries to the right of mid on. Ben Stokes swiftly moves to the right to intercept but makes a fumble and allows the batters to cross over.
On the stumps, on a good length, cutting in, Shubman Gill lets the ball arrive, sees it till the last moment and taps it out to short cover. A very good comeback over from Tongue.
Slightly outside off, on a fullish length. Shubman Gill closely watches it and decides to hang his bat in the air to leave.
Straight and speared full on off, Shubman Gill with a solid front foot block.
The nip-backer on a length, cutting in sharply from off. Shubman Gill first looks to leave, but brings the bat down in time to block that off.
Jadeja flicks this length-delivery to the deep square leg region and milks another single.
Josh Tongue is back into the attack now. Fuller, around off, Jadeja presses forward and defends it out to the off side.
Full and on the stumps, with an in-drift, steered away through square leg for a single. A good, productive over for India this.

FOUR! No half measures on that! Pitched a bit outside off by Shoaib, on a yard behind fuller length, Ravindra Jadeja picks the length in a trice, shimmies down the track and smashes it over the bowler for a boundary straight down the ground. Jadeja moves into the 20s as the partnership now moves to 46 (68).
Pushed through fuller, on off, Ravindra Jadeja blocks it under the bat.
Around the wickets and it slides in on middle, Ravindra Jadeja leans forward and eases it back to the bowler.
Full again, and Gill flicks this to the right of the short mid-wicket fielder for a single.
In front of the stumps, full, pushed to short mid-wicket.

A bit sloppy from the keeper there. Sprayed down the leg stump, Shubman Gill misses to play at it and the ball goes on the bounce to the left of the diving Jamie Smith behind. He fails to cleanly collect the ball and it deflects off his gloves to roll behind. The batters sneak in a bye.

Quick tap and run! Ben Stokes shows a bit of frustration with that quick single. Short and on off, climbing on the batter. Jadeja rises with the bounce and punches it with soft hands to the cover region. Calls his partner through for a quick single.

A bumper from Stokes, bowling according to his field with a deep fine leg and deep backward square leg in position. Gill plays a controlled pull shot, along the turf to deep backward square leg. A single taken. With this, the 250 comes up for India!

Nagging length, outside off from around the stumps. Ravindra Jadeja gets on the back foot and punches it between cover and point. Brydon Carse, at cover, dives and makes a half stop to his right and the ball is parried towards Ben Duckett who moves to his left from backward point to pick the ball up. The batters pinch in a quick single.
Back of a length, outside off, punched into the point region for a single.
Short of a length, on off, angling in. Shubman Gill stands tall and opens his bat face, gets a thick outside edge and the ball rolls to the second slip fielder.
Pushed through quicker and full, on off, Ravindra Jadeja blocks it straight back.
Fuller delivery, sliding on the leg stump, swept by Jadeja, but straight to short fine leg.
Flighted up, full and wide of off, Ravindra Jadeja presses forward and taps it out. Both look for a single, but eventually decide against it.
Drifting on middle and leg, Shubman Gill clips this fuller delivery to the square leg region for a single.
Full and quick, on middle, flicked to short mid-wicket.
Nicely looped up, full and on off, Shubman Gill takes a huge stride ahead and chips it on the bounce to short mid-wicket.
Hard length around off, Jadeja rocks onto the back foot and punches it towards cover.
Shorter in length and bowled at the bodyline, Gill tucks it down to deep backward square leg and picks up a single. Stokes isn't happy with that delivery.
Full and outside off, driven into the ground and towards covers for a quick single.
Back of a length and around off, blocked off by Jadeja.
Length ball, outside off, threatening to nip back in. Jadeja leans across and then decides to leave it alone at the last second.
On the fuller side, but wide of the off stump. Jadeja lets it through to the keeper.
Nicely tossed up, full and around middle, Gill leans on to defend.
A bit quicker and drifting it into the batter, Gill nudges it onto the leg side.
Flighted ball, on a fullish length and around off, Gill leans across and clips it towards mid-wicket.
Flighted ball at the stumps, pushed down to mid on for a single.
Tossed up, full and on middle blocked off by Jadeja.

A loud appeal for LBW, but the umpire remains unmoved. Probably sliding down leg. Ben Stokes has a chat with the bowler and the keeper, but in the end, the time runs out, and Stokes lets it be. This is tossed up on middle, and it slides on with the arm as well. Ravindra Jadeja leans on to block, but the ball beats the inside edge and hits the pads. Replays show that it would have been the umpire's call on wickets had Stokes reviewed.
Good-length delivery in the channel, Jadeja defends it to the left of gully and scampers through easily for a single.
Slightly fuller and angled in on middle and off, straightens a touch and Jadeja jams it out.
Back of a length and outside off punched off the back foot through point for a run.

Short and wide outside off, well wide in fact. Shubman Gill with a loose attempted cut shot but the ball stays a tad low and beats the outside edge. Jamie Smith takes a tumbling take down to his right and there is half an appeal but Stokes turns back and goes back to his mark.
Hard-length delivery around the top of off, punched from the crease and in front of point for a quick single by Jadeja. Good, proactivate running.

Short of a length and outside off, Ravindra Jadeja presses back and taps the ball through cover-point and calls for two. They get the single and then Gill obliges, easily coming back for the second run.
Pitched up wide of the off stump, Gill looks to play the cover drive but is a bit loose and mistimes it badly back to the bowler.
Fuller in length and fairly straight, flicked away wide of mid on for a single.

Back of a length and in the channel, Gill shapes up to cut but realizes that the ball is too close to the body and just dabs it down to deep third for a single. Zak Crawley moves swiftly to his left and keeps the batters down to one.
Nearly a yorker. Very full and angled into off and middle, Gill stays watchful and just pushes it down to mid on.
Back of a length and over off stump, Gill punches it from the crease towards covers.

FOUR! India just starting to counter-attack now and the skipper is leading the charge. Too full and wide, Gill leans across and reaches out before caressing it square through covers for another boundary.
No run there! Nagging length on off, this one just darts back in late. Jadeja jams it out to cover-point and looks for the single but is firmly sent back by the skipper and rightly so.

FOUR! That's nicely done! Back of a length and in the channel, Jadeja presses back and angles the bat, guiding it down to the right of deep backward point. Shoaib Bashir runs to his right and puts in the dive but it goes in vain.
Back of a length and outside off, Gill looks to cut it over point but ends up slashing it down to deep third for a single.

FOUR! In complete control! Banged in well short and over off, Shubman Gill stays upright, gets on top of the bounce and rolls his wrists over the ball to pull it down and in front of deep backward square leg for a boundary.
Pitched up around off, looking to slide one through the gate. Gill watches it well and pushes it across to short mid-wicket.
On a hard length and around off, Gill defends it down to extra cover.
Fuller in length and around off, punched off the front foot to mid off.

Jadeja just doesn't seem all that comfortable with this shortish length right now. Back of a length and around off, Ravindra Jadeja looks to get on his toes and guide it on the off side but gets another inside edge, this time onto the pads.
Good-length delivery, on the fifth stump line, Jadeja hops across to the off side and then just leaves it alone.
Takes pace off again and bowls it fuller and well outside off. Jadeja just watches it go past him and through to the keeper.
Short of a length and around off, Jadeja rises up with the bounce and keeps it down into the off side. Well played.
Slower delivery, back of a length and around off, Jadeja leans on to block but this one sticks in the deck. Jadeja does well to keep it down towards mid on.
Length ball outside off, looking to shape it back in but goes straight on. Gill leaves it alone.
Nearly a chop-on! Hard length on off, nips back in, Jadeja is late and tries to jam it out but gets an inside edge past lg stump and down to fine leg for a single.
Back of a length and over off, banged into the deck, Jadeja gets on his toes and keeps it out on the off side.
Good length, cutting back in from outside off. Gill edges it down with soft hands down to deep third and picks up another single. Stokes oversteps, though, and a NO BALL is called.
Back of a length and outside off, staying on the lower side, Jadeja hops back and angles it down to deep third for one more.
Two is the initial call from Gill but he opts against it. Short of a length and outside off, Shubman Gill cuts it away and gets it wide of deep third for a single.
Starts off with a loosener. Pitched up, well outside off, around the tramline and left alone.

Tap and run! Back of a length and around off, Gill gets up on his toes and dabs it to the left of Ben Stokes at covers and scampers through for a single. This time, Stokes fumbles on the pick up and Gill gets through with ease.
FOUR! That is an eye-catching cover drive from Gill! Pitched up outside off, not all that full but Shubman Gill leans across and strokes it wide of the cover fielder for a boundary.
Good length around off, blocked off.

A risky single but Shubman Gill is well in. Good-length delivery around off, Ravindra Jadeja pushes it to the left of mid off and sets off for the single. Gill obliges but Ben Stokes is quick to latch onto the ball and scores a direct hit at the keeper's end. The third umpire is called in but replays show that Gill is comfortably home.
Fuller in length, on off and angling in, Jadeja drives it straight but can't get it past the bowler.
Starts from around the wicket to the left-hander and bowls it back of a length around off. Jadeja presses back to defend.
Good length around off, Gill leans across and blocks it off.
Hard length on the pads, neatly worked away in front of square leg by Ravindra Jadeja for a single.

OUT! BOWLED'EM! What a delivery from Chris Woakes and England are suddenly in the driver's seat. Lovely seam position from Woakes, bowling it on a good length and fairly wide outside off. Nitish Kumar Reddy gets a stride across and shoulders arms, leaving it on line but the ball nips back in off the deck and hits the top of off stump. NKR can hear the death rattle behind him as he departs for just 1 (6) and from 208/3, India have slipped down to 211/5.
Nitish Kumar Reddy b C Woakes 1 (6b 0x4 0x6)
Fuller in length, bowled outside off and slanted in, NKR makes a watchful leave.
Wider on the crease and pitches it up around middle, Reddy solidly blocks it off.
Back of a length and outside off, tapped away to deep backward point for a single.
Bowled into the deck and darted in on the pads, Gill tucks it to the left of square leg and picks up a single.
